entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
